channel.title: Welcome to Blowfish! :tada: on Jonhenry Poss
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Blowfish! :tada: on Jonhenry Poss

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: About # I am a graduate of MIT in Mechanical Engineering at MIT, former west coast commercial fisherman, and current Formlabs test engineer. I’ve been building machines of all sorts for as long as I can remember and I’m especially interested in combining my interest in mechanical engineering and ocean technology.

item.title: Vases
item.description: Explanation # I like plants. Also, these were a good way to push myself making organic shapes in parametric CAD. All models were designed in Onshape and printed on Formlabs printers

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: Looking to hire? Want to chat about engineering? Contact me here: Name: Email: Message:

item.title: Jawa Babetta Moped Electrification
item.description: Table of Contents: Introduction Design Motor Mod Front Sprocket Battery Battery Box In Action Introduction # In a fit of boredom while writing my thesis, I bought a moped. Specifically, a broken Jawa Babetta 210.

item.title: Uno Electric Unicycle
item.description: Indtroduction Design Machining 3D Printing Electronics Tuning Switching Gears: New Electronics Ryobification Introduction # I fell in love with electric unicycles after spontaneously buying a broken Segway Ninebot Z10 on craigslist and fixing it up.

item.title: Snowtercycle
item.description: Table of Contents: Introduction Design Front Suspension Triple Clamp Electronics In Action Introduction # MITERS has a long tradition of building scooters and road vehicles that fail quickly once the first snow falls in Boston.

item.title: Electric Mountainboard
item.description: Introduction Deck Battery Battery Box All the Metal Riding and Testing Introduction # The sidewalks of MIT are not exactly smooth enough for normal skateboarding. This however, the BOAT has 10 in tires and independent suspension to handle the lunar landscape that are the streets of Cambridge.
